Property.Label: A Unique Instance ID for this instance
Property.Description: Specifies the instance id. This is required and used to determine if the machine should take "first boot" actions
Specifies the hostname for the appliance

Property.Label: Url to seed instance data from
Property.Description: This field is optional, but indicates that the instance should 'seed' user-data and meta-data from the given url. If set to 'http://tinyurl.com/sm-' is given, meta-data will be pulled from http://tinyurl.com/sm-meta-data and user-data from http://tinyurl.com/sm-user-data. Leave this empty if you do not want to seed from a url.

Property.Label: ssh public keys
Property.Description: This field is optional, but indicates that the instance should populate the default user's 'authorized_keys' with this value

Property.Label: Encoded user-data
Property.Description: In order to fit into a xml attribute, this value is base64 encoded . It will be decoded, and then processed normally as user-data.

Property.Label: Default User's password
Property.Description: If set, the default user's password will be set to this value to allow password based login. The password will be good for only a single login. If set to the string 'RANDOM' then a random password will be generated, and written to the console.
